physical_object.name: red packet of Shin Ramyeon spicy ramen

assignments.utilization_method: Lay the unopened packet flat; strike the middle of the pouch to pop the air pocket.

physical_object.name: hand brush with wooden handle and black bristles

assignments.utilization_method: Lay the brush bristles upward on the desk; strike downward so the canopy buries into the bristle field.

physical_object.name: spray bottle with translucent white top and blue liquid

assignments.utilization_method: Hook three fingers around the narrow neck beneath the trigger, place thumb on the opposite side, lift, and tilt the bottle forward while countering the forward weight

physical_object.name: folded checkered umbrella with hooked handle

assignments.utilization_method: Grab the straight mid-shaft with a full-hand grasp, keep the hooked handle pointing backward, and let the folded canopy act as the weighted head while performing full chopping swings
Keep the stick collapsed, wrap hand around the foam grip, and drive the phone clamp end downward toward the desk in a hammering motion
Grip the narrow vertical stem beneath the fan head with a closed fist and swing the entire fan in short sweeping arcs, letting the fan head lead the motion.
